document.full_text: adobe released three new applications for the apple ipad that will let digital artists take advantage of the device's multitouch screen to enhance the use of adobe photoshop on a desktop computer.
document.title: adobe makes apps to enhance photoshop
lines_and_colors: adobe released three new applications for the apple ipad that will let digital artists take advantage of the device's multitouch screen to enhance the use of adobe photoshop on a desktop computer.
